dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The 'Biz Birgemiz' forum really highlights how Kazakhstan's traditional values of solidarity and empathy are being put into action right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The 'Biz Birgemiz' forum really highlights how Kazakhstan's traditional values of solidarity and empathy are being put into action right now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, and Prime Minister Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev specifically praised medical workers, police, and volunteers for their efforts during the crisis.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, and Prime Minister Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev specifically praised medical workers, police, and volunteers for their efforts during the crisis.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum. Every day we have witnessed feats accomplished throughout the country by medical workers, police officers, members of the Armed Forces, volunteers, and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and then you've got Kaspi.kz, their CFO Mikhail Lomtadze mentioned they helped 4.4 million people receive social payments through their app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and then you've got the website, their C F O Mikhail Lomtadze mentioned they helped four point four million people receive social payments through their app.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency. As a result, 4.4 million people received their payments online through the Kaspi.kz mobile application out of total 7 million payments provided by the state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, out of a total of 7 million payments from the state—that's a huge chunk handled digitally, which is impressive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, out of a total of seven million payments from the state-that's a huge chunk handled digitally, which is impressive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, 4.4 million people received their payments online through the Kaspi.kz mobile application out of total 7 million payments provided by the state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it wasn't just payments; they also organized delivery for over 50,000 families so people could shop safely from home.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it wasn't just payments; they also organized delivery for over fifty thousand families so people could shop safely from home.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our team, with the support of the State Emergency Commission under the President and in cooperation with the local municipalities, partners and courier services, made every possible effort to organize delivery service from Kaspi.kz Marketplace Platform and give more than 500,000 families in Kazakhstan the opportunity to shop safely online without leaving their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which, you know, required coordinating with the State Emergency Commission, local governments, couriers… that's a massive logistical effort.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, you know, required coordinating with the State Emergency Commission, local governments, couriers... that's a massive logistical effort.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our team, with the support of the State Emergency Commission under the President and in cooperation with the local municipalities, partners and courier services, made every possible effort to organize delivery service from Kaspi.kz Marketplace Platform and give more than 500,000 families in Kazakhstan the opportunity to shop safely online without leaving their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, the co-founders donated 10,000 COVID tests to labs—like, that's direct support for public health too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, the co-founders donated ten thousand COVID tests to labs-like, that's direct support for public health too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze and Vyacheslav Kim, co-founders of Kaspi.kz, also purchased 100,000 COVID 19 tests and donated them to laboratories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how the medal ceremony recognized such a wide range of contributors—doctors, cultural figures, media, even philanthropists.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how the medal ceremony recognized such a wide range of contributors-doctors, cultural figures, media, even philanthropists.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel, cultural figures, media representatives, volunteers and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the 'People's Gratitude Medal' seems like a way to formally acknowledge everyone who stepped up during the emergency.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the 'People's Gratitude Medal' seems like a way to formally acknowledge everyone who stepped up during the emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Lomtadze made a point to thank the National Bank and Ministry of Finance for their support—shows how much collaboration was involved.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Lomtadze made a point to thank the National Bank and Ministry of Finance for their support-shows how much collaboration was involved.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We would like to thanks our colleagues from the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection and Government for Citizens for their support.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Really underscores the 'we are together' motto, doesn't it? Like, public-private partnership in action.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Really underscores the 'we are together' motto, doesn't it? Like, public-private partnership in action.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's one thing to talk about unity, but delivering concrete help to millions? That's where it counts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's one thing to talk about unity, but delivering concrete help to millions? That's where it counts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And doing it all during a state of emergency—just shows what's possible when people and institutions work toward a common goal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And doing it all during a state of emergency-just shows what's possible when people and institutions work toward a common goal.

artist_script:
The 'Biz Birgemiz' forum really highlights how Kazakhstan's traditional values of solidarity and empathy are being put into action right now.
HostB: Absolutely, and Prime Minister Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev specifically praised medical workers, police, and volunteers for their efforts during the crisis.
HostA: Yeah, and then you’ve got Kaspi.kz, their CFO Mikhail Lomtadze mentioned they helped 4.4 million people receive social payments through their app.
HostB: Right, out of a total of 7 million payments from the state—that’s a huge chunk handled digitally, which is impressive.
HostA: And it wasn’t just payments; they also organized delivery for over 50,000 families so people could shop safely from home.
HostB: Which, you know, required coordinating with the State Emergency Commission, local governments, couriers… that’s a massive logistical effort.
HostA: Plus, the co-founders donated 10,000 COVID tests to labs—like, that’s direct support for public health too.
HostB: It’s interesting how the medal ceremony recognized such a wide range of contributors—doctors, cultural figures, media, even philanthropists.
HostA: Yeah, the ‘People’s Gratitude Medal’ seems like a way to formally acknowledge everyone who stepped up during the emergency.
HostB: And Lomtadze made a point to thank the National Bank and Ministry of Finance for their support—shows how much collaboration was involved.
HostA: Really underscores the ‘we are together’ motto, doesn’t it? Like, public-private partnership in action.
HostB: For sure. It’s one thing to talk about unity, but delivering concrete help to millions? That’s where it counts.
HostA: Exactly. And doing it all during a state of emergency—just shows what’s possible when people and institutions work toward a common goal.
